flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
少しの　ショックで　すぐに　爆発する。
モンスターボールに　強力な　パルスを
浴びせた　ときに　生まれたと　ウワサされている。

Voltorb is extremely sensitive—it explodes at the slightest
of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a
Poké Ball was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.

Voltorb è estremamente sensibile, esplode alla minima
sollecitazione. Si dice che sia stato creato esponendo
una Poké Ball a una forte carica energetica.

Voltorb es tremendamente sensible y a la más mínima
sacudida explota. Cuentan que se creó cuando alguien
expuso una Poké Ball a una gran descarga eléctrica.

Voltobal ist äußerst empfindlich, es explodiert schon bei der
leichtesten Erschütterung. Man munkelt, es sei entstanden, als
ein Pokéball einen starken elektrischen Schlag bekommen hat.

Voltorbe est extrêmement sensible. Il explose au moindre
choc. On raconte qu’il fut créé par l’exposition d’une
Poké Ball à une puissante dose d’énergie.

작은 충격에도 바로 폭발한다.
몬스터볼에 강력한 전류를
가했을 때 태어났다는 소문이 돌고 있다.

すこしの　ショックで　すぐに　ばくはつする。
モンスターボールに　きょうりょくな　パルスを
あびせた　ときに　うまれたと　ウワサされている。

モンスターボールを　つくっている　会社で
初めて　発見された　ことと　姿形が
似ている　ことの　関係は　まだ　ナゾである。

Voltorb was first sighted at a company that manufactures
Poké Balls. The link between that sighting and the fact
that this Pokémon looks very similar to a Poké Ball remains
a mystery.

Voltorb è stato avvistato per la prima volta in un’azienda
produttrice di Poké Ball. Il nesso tra la sua presenza in
questa fabbrica e l’estrema somiglianza a una Poké Ball
rimane un mistero.

Voltorb fue visto por primera vez en una empresa encargada
de comercializar Poké Balls. La conexión que existe entre
aquella primera vez que se le vio y el hecho de que se parece
mucho a una Poké Ball sigue siendo un misterio.

Voltobal wurde zuerst bei einer Firma beobachtet,
die Pokébälle herstellt. Der Zusammenhang zwischen
dieser Beobachtung und der Tatsache, dass dieses
Pokémon wie ein Pokéball aussieht, ist noch ungeklärt.

La première fois qu’on a vu Voltorbe, c’était dans une usine
qui fabrique des Poké Balls. Personne n’a jamais pu expliquer
le lien entre cet événement et la ressemblance frappante
de ce Pokémon avec une Poké Ball.

몬스터볼을 만드는 회사에서
처음 발견됐다는 점과 생김새가 비슷한
점의 관련성은 아직도 수수께끼다.

モンスターボールを　つくっている　かいしゃで
はじめて　はっけんされた　ことと　すがたかたちが
にている　ことの　かんけいは　まだ　ナゾである。

発電所などに　現れる。
モンスターボールと　間違えて
触って　しびれる　人が　多い。

Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a
Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.

Di solito vive nelle centrali elettriche. Se confuso
con una Poké Ball, può essere fatale.

Suele vivir en centrales de energía. Mucha gente
acaba muy mal al confundirlo con una Poké Ball.

Dieses Pokémon wird oftmals mit einem Pokéball
verwechselt. Es lebt vorwiegend in Kraftwerken.

Vivant près des centrales électriques, ce Pokémon
survolté est souvent confondu avec une Poké Ball.

발전소 등에서 나타난다.
몬스터볼과 헷갈려서
만지고 마비되는 사람이 많다.

はつでんしょなどに　あらわれる。
モンスターボールと　まちがえて
さわって　しびれるひとが　おおい。

モンスターボールが　売り出されたのと
同じ　時期に　発見された。
なにか　関係があると　いわれる。

It was discovered when Poké Balls were
introduced. It is said that there is
some connection.

Scoperto all’epoca dell’invenzione delle Poké Ball.
Si pensa che i due fatti siano correlati.

Fue descubierto cuando se crearon las Poké Balls.
Se dice que tiene algo que ver con ellas.

Es wurde entdeckt, als man Pokébälle einführte.
Es scheint, als gäbe es da einen Zusammenhang.

Découvert en même temps que les Poké Balls.
Il paraît qu’il existe un lien entre les deux.

몬스터볼이 팔리기 시작했을 때와
같은 시기에 발견되었다.
뭔가 관계가 있다고 전해진다.

モンスターボールが　うりだされたのと
おなじ　じきに　はっけんされた。
なにか　かんけいがある　といわれる。

It looks just like a Poké Ball.
It is dangerous because it may
electrocute or explode on contact.

It looks just like a Poké Ball.
It is dangerous because it may
electrocute or explode on contact.

It looks just like a Poké Ball.
It is dangerous because it may
electrocute or explode on touch.

Il ressemble à une Poké Ball. Ce
Pokémon dangereux peut exploser
ou s’électrifier au toucher.

It looks just like a Poké Ball.
It is dangerous because it may
electrocute or explode on touch.

Il ressemble à une Poké Ball. Ce
Pokémon dangereux peut exploser
ou s’électrifier au toucher.

It was discovered when Poké Balls
were introduced. It is said that
there is some connection.

It rolls to move. If the ground is
uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting
a bump can cause it to explode.

It looks just like a Poké Ball.
It is dangerous because it may
electrocute or explode on touch.

It looks just like a Poké Ball.
It is dangerous because it may
electrocute or explode on touch.

It looks just like a Poké Ball.
It is dangerous because it may
electrocute or explode on touch.

Usually found in power plants. Easily
mistaken for a POKé BALL, it has
zapped many people.

A life-form whose identity is unknown.
It is said to SCREECH or suddenly
SELFDESTRUCT.

It bears an uncanny and unexplained
resemblance to a POKé BALL. Because it
explodes at the slightest shock, even
veteran TRAINERS treat it with caution.

VOLTORB is extremely sensitive - it
explodes at the slightest of shocks.
It is rumored that it was first created when a POKé BALL was exposed to a
powerful pulse of energy.

VOLTORB was first sighted at a company
that manufactures POKé BALLS.
The link between that sighting and the fact that this POKéMON looks very
similar to a POKé BALL remains a
mystery.

During the study
of this POKéMON,
it was discovered that its compo­
nents are not
found in nature.

It was discovered
when POKé BALLS
were introduced. It is said that
there is some
connection.

It rolls to move.
If the ground is
uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting
a bump can cause
it to explode.

It is said to
camouflage itself
as a POKé BALL. It will self-destruct
with very little
stimulus.

Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.
